title: Hour 3 - Bob Nightengale (07-03-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Bob Nightengale (07-03-20)
description:
It's a very special 4th of July Eve edition of the Dan Patrick Show! FOX Sports Radio hosts Rob Parker and Jason Smith are in for Dan and the Danettes, and the guys react to the breaking news that the Washington Redskins have agreed to conduct an internal review into changing their name following reports that big money sponsors had asked the club to drop the Redskins nickname, and tell us why they have a big problem with the NFL asking fans to sign waivers to come and watch games in person this season. Plus, USA Today MLB columnist Bob Nightengale stops by to discuss the impending return of baseball and explain why expects a large number of players to test positive for COVID-19 when the MLB's report finally gets released.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

It's a very special 4th of July Eve edition of the Dan Patrick Show! FOX Sports Radio hosts Rob Parker and Jason Smith are in for Dan and the Danettes, and the guys react to the breaking news that the Washington Redskins have agreed to conduct an internal review into changing their name following reports that big money sponsors had asked the club to drop the Redskins nickname, and tell us why they have a big problem with the NFL asking fans to sign waivers to come and watch games in person this season. Plus, USA Today MLB columnist Bob Nightengale stops by to discuss the impending return of baseball and explain why expects a large number of players to test positive for COVID-19 when the MLB's report finally gets released.
